Thank you, Bruce.
Now...
let me see one right now. One time.
-Quick. -Very.
Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter.
It says NASA launched it in 2009.
See, forensics show Wang may have messed with the code,
preventing it from mapping the far side of the moon, which is also the dark side.

translation.en: Fucking awesome.
They infiltrate us, intimidate us, coerce us to do their dirty work.

translation.en: And once they're done...
...a double-tap to the cerebellum.
So humans are working for the Decepticons.
I don't think this is about the Decepticons looking for something on the moon.

translation.en: I think it's about something they wanted to hide.

Come on, throw down.

He's a freak.
-Like it? -Get back!
I'm ticklish! [laughing]
Sir! We are having a pretty high-level alien intel confab here

[Brains] Oh, that was smooth, Bumblebee.
Missed it by that much.
Hi.
Would somebody care to tell me what the hell's going on?
-Who are you? -Who are you?
translation.es: - ¿Qué demonios pasa aquí?- ¿Quién eres tú? - ¿Quién eres tú?- ¿Quién soy? ¿Y ella? ¡Dutch, regístrala!

translation.en: Who am I? Who is that? Dutch! Frisk her!
Certainly.
No. Dutch.
translation.es: - Claro que sí.- No. - Dutch.- No me toque.

-I'm not gonna touch her. -Sam?
Angel.
Uh, I was working. I'm sorry about this.
[Wheelie] Great. We're homeless. She lives here? Wow.
You had your chance to frisk her. I have a girlfriend.

translation.en: Really? What's her name?
We're supposed to be at Dylan's party, remember?

translation.en: You know what I liked about your war stories, Sam?

translation.en: It's that they were stories, they were in the past.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué me gustaba de tus historias? Que eran del pasado.

translation.en: [Sam] Look, I know you're thinking about your brother, okay?
translation.es: Sé que estás pensando en tu hermanoy en tu familia.

translation.en: And you're thinking about your family. And it's not that situation.
translation.es: Sé que estás pensando en tu hermanoy en tu familia. No es lo mismo.

translation.en: -No? -No.
Why not? Why isn't it, Sam?
You think we'd rather have his medals, or we'd rather have him?

translation.en: I hear you. I get it. Where are you taking my bunny? Stop!
Just stop for a second. You think I could sleep last night?
And then it hit me. No, Sam wants to be in danger.
translation.es: Sam quiere correr peligro.No sabe quién es sin eso.

translation.en: -He doesn't know who he is without it. -I just want to matter.
translation.es: Sam quiere correr peligro.No sabe quién es sin eso. Quiero ser importante.

translation.en: You matter to me.
I know you're worried. I know you're worried. But I promise you, I can handle this.

translation.en: Can you? You can promise it?
I promise.
Sam, I don't want to lose you, and I know where this leads.

-Are you coming with me? -I can't.
Okay.
Hey.
Here's your foot.
The warrior's path is a solitary one.

translation.en: Rich bastards!
I used to hate them. Now, it's...
[Simmons] Going to a gig on the hunt for two Russian cosmonauts.
translation.es: Voy a un trabajo en buscade dos cosmonautas rusos.

translation.en: Nothing like driving in a Maybach, huh?
Germans know how to make cars, let me tell you.
My Dutchman, former NSA cybersleuth extraordinaire,
translation.es: Mi Dutchman, un gran ex cibersabuesode la Agencia de Seguridad

So, these cosmonauts went into hiding. Why?
Bingo. I got a match.
You're a German Shepherd, Dutch.
[Simmons] The thing about Russians is, they never like to talk.

translation.en: It's gonna take a little of the "international language."
-Do svidaniya. -That means "goodbye."
[mumbles] Watch this.
Dutch, give me something tough.
We do speak English.
Dutch, you suck.
It's a Cyrillic alphabet.
It's like all the buttons you never push on a calculator!

translation.en: [Dutch] I don't suck.
Agent Seymour Simmons, Sector Eight, formerly Seven.
translation.es: Agente Seymour Simmons,Sector Ocho, antes el Siete.

translation.en: We know who you are, cosmonautchiks.
So what?
You were supposed to travel to the dark side of the moon,

translation.en: then it all got shut down.
The question is, why?
"Can my child smoke in here?"
Okay, all right. Okay.
-Go ahead, shoot me. -[speaking Russian]
I'm willing to die for my country. Are you?
translation.es: Estoy dispuesto a morirpor mi país. ¿Y tú?

translation.en: -[Simmons] Really? -[shouts in Russian]
You are beautiful. Has anyone ever told you you're beautiful? She's a beautiful woman.

translation.en: Dutch! Back in the cage.
[imitates Dutch accent] Dutch! Hold, Dutch, hold!
Control your boy, please. Control your boy. Dutch, stop!
I'm so sorry. That is the old me.

translation.en: Okay, let's everybody just calm down!
Let's lower the heat, lower the guns. Let's relax. World War II is over.
translation.es: Bajen la ira, las armas.La II Guerra Mundial ya se acabó.

translation.en: [Dimitri] You are about to see one of the biggest Soviet secrets.

translation.en: America first to send man to the moon.
translation.es: Estados Unidos, primeroen mandar hombre a la Luna.

translation.en: But USSR first to send camera.
In 1959, our Luna 3 take picture of the dark, the shadow side.
translation.es: En 1959, nuestro Luna 3toma foto del lado oscuro, de sombra.

translation.en: Sees nothing.
But in 1963, Luna 4 sees--
Strange rocks.
Yeah.
Around the ship. Hundreds of them.
Yeah, show picture.
With some drag marks.
[Sam] I've seen these. These aren't rocks, these are pillars. Alien pillars for a space bridge.
translation.es: Yo los he visto. No son rocas,son pilares para un puente espacial.

translation.en: We know about them because the Autobots have five of these.
The Decepticons must have raided the ship before Apollo 11 ever got there,
translation.es: Seguro los Decépticons saquearonla nave antes de llegar Apolo 11.

translation.en: took the pillars, and hid them.
translation.es: Se llevaron los pilares y los escondieron.

translation.en: It doesn't make sense. The Decepticons have the ship. They have all those pillars.
translation.es: No tiene sentido.Los Decépticons tienen los pilares.

translation.es: ¿Por qué dejar a Sentinelsi solamente él los sabe usar?

translation.en: Unless... He's the one thing they still need.
translation.es: - A menos...- Que él sea lo único que necesitan.

translation.en: We've got to meet up with Sentinel, rendezvous with him and keep him safe.
translation.es: Tenemos que ver a Sentinel,mantenerlo a salvo.

translation.es: Señor Witwicky, le dijeque no me llamara a este teléfono.

translation.en: Listen, the whole thing has been a setup since the beginning.
translation.es: Toda la cosa es una trampa.

translation.en: But we have the space bridge. Mearing, you have five pillars.

translation.en: I just learned that they have hundreds. You're doing exactly what they wanted you to do. What do you need me to say to you?
translation.es: Ellos tienen cientos.¡Está haciendo justo lo que ellos querían!

translation.en: The Decepticons are coming for Sentinel Prime!

translation.en: We're going to NEST.
[man, on PA] We have an Energon alert. Energon readings detected on the D.C. parkway.

Oh, mein Gott! I'm fired!
Watch out! Watch out! Watch out!
Got you!
Shoot him! Shoot him! Shoot him, Bee!
Bee, you've got to move faster! Faster, Bee! Go!
All right, back to NEST!
Dino, I got him!
Ironhide!
Is there a problem?
Whoa. A little Mexican standoff we got here.
Weapons down.
And we'll let you escape with your dignity.

That's good.

Ironhide, catch!
Behind you!
Decepticon punk!
Class dismissed.
Get inside! Let's go!
Move! Keep moving!
-[Sam] Lennox! -Go, go, go!

Hey, you've got to guard him, 'cause he's the key to the whole thing.

I hereby discharge you from duty.
-Bee! -Get back!
Rally all NEST forces back to the base! Come on!

Get a medic down here!
We don't have enough men! Do not engage Sentinel!

Watch left! Watch left!
[Mearing] Let's go! Follow me!
-Director, don't go there! -Stand down!
Hey, Sentinel!
-Director! -[Mearing] What is going on? What do you think you are doing?
I am a Prime!
I do not take orders from you.

Now, return what belongs to me!
Oh, my God!
-[siren blaring] -Move!
-[soldier 1] You guys okay? -[soldier 2] Is everybody out?
Everybody, stay calm. You're gonna be fine.

Come on, let's go. All right, notify the 101st Airborne!

Carly!
[Ron] Hot from our little campfire.
-S'mores. Isn't that great? -Aww.

[Sam] Mom, Dad, have you guys seen Carly come home yet?
Excuse me. Can you knock, please? This is our bedroom.

translation.en: -Why wouldn't she be at home? -We had a fight, and we might have broken up,
translation.es: - Toca antes de entrar. Es nuestra alcoba.- ¿No está en casa? Nos peleamos y quizá rompimoso estemos tomando un descanso.

translation.en: or be on a break. I don't really know.

-I can't go into details, Mom. I have to find her. -You gotta be kidding me.
Sit down. We're having a family meeting. Family meeting!
You may not know this, but your father and I were not always this perfectly happy.

translation.en: You know, there was a time in our marriage when I thought this was not gonna work out.

translation.en: -Can we please not? -She's damaging him.

translation.en: No. Stop. Stop, okay? She dumped me,
I moved on to something better. That's it. I'm a happier person.

translation.en: [Judy] You're not gonna get a third one.

translation.en: I mean, unless you have like a big...
translation.es: - a menos que tengas un enorme...- ¿Qué?

translation.en: What the... Ma!
Maybe you just don't know what you're doing.

translation.en: -I don't want to talk about this anymore. -You need the book.
translation.es: - No sabes qué haces.- No quiero hablar. - Necesitas el libro.- No tienes la razón. Acostúmbrate.

translation.en: -Tell him about the book. -You're always wrong. Get used to it.

translation.en: Okay. You've gotta read this. She Comes First.
translation.es: Ella en primer lugar.Aquí hay cosas increíbles.

translation.en: -That's it, I'm going. -No! No!
translation.es: No, no, no. No quiere ir.

-Happy wife, happy life. -Heck yeah.
Unhappy wife, stone-cold misery for the rest of your--

translation.en: -Stop. -It's true.
All I'm saying is, do you love this girl? She's the one.

translation.en: Then you gotta go get her.
I mean, your dad and I, when we had troubles, he moved heaven and earth to find me.

translation.en: Say what you said. Say it.
[Ron] "I will follow you to the end of time."
Does that suck or what? -It's like a bad sci-fi film. -No. It is so sweet.
translation.es: Qué cursi, ¿no?Como de ciencia ficción mala.

translation.en: I want you to get out of the city. You get as far away from here as you can. You understand?

translation.en: I love you.
Ah, my master! Such a brilliant scheme!
So when Sentinel left Cybertron, it was to defect?
translation.es: Entonces cuando Sentinel dejó Cybertron, ¿fue para desertar?

translation.en: He was meant to rendezvous with me here on Earth before fate waylaid us both.
translation.es: Nos íbamos a encontrar aquí, en la Tierra,pero el destino nos tendió una emboscada.

translation.en: The only way to revive him,
we needed Prime and his Matrix.
translation.es: era con Óptimus y su Matrix.

translation.en: [Starscream] Excellent strategy.
Mine, mine!
So he is now your partner, master?
He is my greatest triumph.
So impressive.
Commencing transport.
Stop! No! No, Sentinel!
Forgive me.
Here we are.
Fight us now.
Autobots, retreat!
Why, Sentinel, why?
For Cybertron! For our home!
What war destroyed, we can rebuild!
But only if we join with the Decepticons.

translation.en: No, it's not the only way. This is our home. We must defend the humans.

translation.en: So lost you are, Optimus.
On Cybertron, we were gods.
And here, they call us machines.
Let the humans serve us, or perish.
translation.es: Que los humanos nos sirvan o perezcan.

translation.en: You're lucky I didn't kill you. In time you'll see.
translation.es: Tienes suerte de que no te maté. Con el tiempo entenderás.

translation.en: It's not over.
[Dylan] Now, if I were him, I wouldn't let you out of my sight for one second.
translation.es: Si fuera él...nunca te perdería de vista.

translation.en: It's funny. I was just thinking on the way over here, I could really use some advice from Dylan, and there he is.
translation.es: Qué curioso, pensaba aconsejarmecon Dylan. ¿Podemos hablar, Carly?

translation.en: -Can I speak to you, Carly? -Welcome. Please, sit down. Have a drink.
You know what, I don't need a drink. Or a car, or a job.
translation.es: No necesito un trago.Ni auto, ni trabajo.

translation.en: I just need to speak to my girlfriend alone. Is that okay with you, Mr. Inappropriate?
translation.es: Sólo hablar con mi novia.¿Sí, Don Inapropiado?

translation.en: Excuse me.
-[Carly] What's going on? -[Sam] I'll tell you outside.
I really think I can help you, Sam. I remember a talk I had with my dad once about tough choices.

translation.en: Yeah, now's not the time. We'll set something up, though.
translation.es: Ahora no, será en otra ocasión.

translation.en: Of course, it was way back, when my dad's firm was in charge of budget review and accounting for NASA.
translation.es: Fue hace mucho, cuando mi papá revisabael presupuesto de la NASA.

translation.en: You see, the thing that he taught me was, when it's not your war, you join the side that's going to win.
translation.es: Lo que me enseñó fue: Cuando no estu guerra, únete al lado ganador.

translation.en: -Move. -Too direct? Or is it just me?
translation.es: - Vámonos.- ¿Muy directo? - ¿O soy yo?- No es usted, señor.

translation.en: Certainly not you, sir.
translation.es: - ¿O soy yo?- No es usted, señor.

translation.en: -[Carly screams] -[Soundwave] You're mine!
No!
-Get help! -Sam, I can't get out!
-[Sam] Someone get help! -Good night! Good night, Mr. Dylan.
[Carly] Get me out of here!
[Sam] Help! Get help!
-He's young. He will learn. Good night. -Get me out!
It was a fun night.
You really think you're the first man ever asked to join the noble alien cause?
translation.es: ¿Crees que eres el primero en unirtea la noble causa extraterrestre?

translation.en: Who are you?
Do you know why we've not been back to the moon since 1972?
translation.es: ¿Sabes por qué no hemos vueltoa la luna desde 1972?

translation.en: Because these two, they came to my dad and they told him to do some creative accounting.
translation.es: Porque ellos le pidieron a mi papáque hiciera cuentas creativas.

translation.en: Make it way too expensive to ever go back. So, he and the others
translation.es: Que fuera muy caro volver. Adiós programa espacialamericano y ruso.

translation.en: shut down the American and Russian space programs.
And they've been our clients ever since. You helped them kill people?
translation.es: - Y ahora son nuestros clientes.- ¿Les ayudaste a matar gente?

translation.en: You think they'd give you a choice? Besides, it's not like I personally participated.
translation.es: No tuve más remedio.No participé en persona.

translation.en: I am a liaison. I liaise.
translation.es: Yo soy un enlace. Yo enlazo.

translation.en: It's hostile takeover time, Sam.
translation.es: Es hora de tomar el mando.

translation.en: Sam!
Sam!
-Let her go! -Sam!
[Dylan] I've had my eye on you for years, Sam.
You're the one spy I've never been able to provide as someone close to the Autobots.
translation.es: No les había podido dar un espíacercano a los Autobots.

translation.en: Sam! Don't do what he wants!
Yes, he will.
They all do.
They will slaughter her, you understand me?
In the time it takes you to blink, they'll do it to her, and they'll do it to me.
translation.es: Lo que tardas en parpadearacabarán con ella y conmigo.

translation.en: So you show a little respect when someone offers you a job!
translation.es: ¡Así que muestra respetocuando alguien te ofrece un empleo!

translation.en: Wrist.
You are to track down Optimus Prime, because you're the one human he trusts,
translation.es: Vas a buscar a Óptimus Primeporque confía en ti.

translation.en: and you will ask one question. How does he intend to fight back?
translation.es: Le vas a preguntar cómo piensa pelear.

translation.en: Strategies, tactics, everything!
Has a nasty little bite, doesn't it? It's very high-tech.
translation.es: Tiene una mordida fea.Es de muy alta tecnología.

translation.en: It lets us see what you see, hear what you hear, and it taps your nervous system.
translation.es: Nos permite ver lo que vesy bloquea tu sistema nervioso.

translation.en: So, if you so much as try and signal...
translation.es: Si tratas de hacer una señal...

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, Sam. Relationships have consequences.
I am here because of my father. She is here because of you.
translation.es: Yo estoy aquí por mi padre.Ella está aquí por ti.

translation.en: Stop, stop! Stop! Stop!
Soundwave, would you please?
Sam, do your job.
She'll be safe. I give you my word.

translation.en: I'll kill you. You have my word.

translation.en: [Morshower] Combatant Commands are now at DEFCON 1.
Approximately 200 Decepticons are now in hiding.
Energon detectors have been triggered as far away as South America and China.

we have come for your natural resources to rebuild our damaged planet.

you must immediately exile the Autobot rebels you have harbored.

translation.en: Non-negotiable.
Renounce the rebels.
We await your reply.
[Mearing] We'll debrief you in transit.
Yeah, I really don't see how I can be of any help. I mean, you guys seem pretty busy. We could just do this another time, I think.

translation.en: I have underestimated you at every turn. What?

Who am I? Hey, you're the expert. I'm just a walking security risk.

-Yes. -No, you're not. You're sweating.

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm sweating because I'm nervous. I'm nervous because you got me in here with this information.
translation.es: Estoy bien. Estoy nervioso.Veo toda esta información.

translation.en: Okay, I'm a Twitter junkie. I blog everything. -I can't keep a secret to save my life. -You wouldn't dare.
translation.es: Soy adicto al Twitter.No sé guardar secretos.

translation.en: That's the truth. I'm telling you. Director, the Pentagon's calling in 15.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Nothing. What are you doing?
Get away from me.
It's been a remarkable series of events today at the Capitol.
translation.es: Ha habido eventos extrañosen el Capitolio,

translation.en: The U.S. military alliance with them -is officially over. -[phone vibrating]

translation.es: En palabras del presidentede la Cámara de Diputados:

What? They can't do this.
translation.es: - "No podemos..."- ¿Qué? - No pueden hacer eso. Dígales.- Es oficial. Tenemos luz verde.

translation.en: You gotta tell them. They can't do that. Okay. It's official. It's a go, people.
translation.es: - No pueden hacer eso. Dígales.- Es oficial. Tenemos luz verde.

translation.en: These are our allies. The Autobots fought for us. They fought with us.
And where are we now? Facing an enemy invasion
with an enemy that has the means to deploy countless more.

translation.en: If there is any more you know, anything at all about the enemy's intentions...

translation.en: now is the time to tell.
Autobots have no way of leaving this planet. And that is where you're wrong.

translation.en: Its name is the Xanthium.
It brought the second wave of Autobots, and it's been under NASA's care and study ever since.
translation.es: Trajo la segunda oleada de Autobotsy la NASA lo ha estado estudiando.

translation.en: We linked it with a decommissioned shuttle to maintain military control until they're gone.

translation.en: Gonna be 10,000 pounds of torque on that itsy-bitsy bolt, not 19!

translation.en: You're gonna risk the lives of all me mates! I'll ball you!

translation.en: These guys are the Wreckers. They take care of the Xanthium.
We don't let them off the base much, 'cause they're assholes.

translation.en: You gotta pull that, ya nancy wanker! It's time to kill him!
I'm just trying to help, you know. Just doing my job.
[Epps] Just calm down. Leave him alone. This is a human being.
-Epps! -[Roadbuster] You are ridiculous!
-[Sam] Is that you? -What up, man?
-What are you doing here? -[electronic whirring] I retired from the Air Force.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces aquí?- Me retiré de la Fuerza Aérea.

translation.en: Can you let my hand go?
What the hell was that?
Now I just consult to run interference for them.

No more combat and aliens shooting at my ass. I got a dream job.

translation.en: Kicking the Autobots out. Can you believe this is happening?

translation.en: Where do you think it's taking them? Any planet but here.

translation.en: I wanna talk to whoever's in charge here.
Well, well, well. Charlotte Mearing.
Agent Simmons. Former Agent Simmons.
So, I see you survived Washington.
Washington, Egypt, heartbreak. I survive. I will survive.
translation.es: Washington, Egipto, un corazón roto.Yo sobrevivo. Yo sobreviviré.

translation.es: Van a traer a todos y ponertoda la información sobre la mesa.

translation.en: And if you think deporting nine Autobots is gonna solve a damn thing--
translation.es: ¡Si crees que deportar a nueveAutobots va a resolver algo!

translation.en: It's out of my hands.
Moving up in the world, huh?
Your booty looks excellent.
If you ever say a word to anyone about what happened that night in Quantico,
translation.es: Si cuentas lo que pasóen Quantico esa noche,

translation.es: Sammy, escúchame. - No dejes que nos exilien.- No dejes que nos lleven.

[Leadfoot] Check the nitrogen levels. We're booking out of here.

translation.en: Optimus?
What your leaders say is true. This was all my fault.

translation.es: Les dije en quién confiar. Estaba muy equivocado.

translation.en: That doesn't make it your fault. It just makes you human for a change.

translation.en: Remember this.
You may lose your faith in us,
translation.es: Quizá pierdan la fe en nosotros,

translation.en: but never in yourselves.
translation.es: pero jamás deben perderla fe en ustedes mismos.

translation.en: I need to know how you're gonna fight back.
I know this is strategy, I know you're coming back
translation.es: Sé que hay una estrategia,volver con refuerzos o algo.

translation.en: with reinforcements, something. I know there's a plan.
translation.es: Sé que hay una estrategia,volver con refuerzos o algo. Hay un plan.

translation.es: Me lo puedes decir.Ningún humano se enterará.

If we just do what they want, how are we gonna live with ourselves?

You always will be.
But your leaders have spoken.
From here...
the fight will be your own.
[Optimus] Make it short.
We're loading up.
[Leadfoot] All right, hustle up! We're launching at dawn.
We're gonna do whatever we can. Make it like it was.

translation.en: You will always be my friend, Sam.
translation.es: Tú... siempre serás... mi amigo, Sam.

translation.en: I gotta be going on.
Years from now, they're gonna ask us,
translation.es: Dentro de muchos años,nos van a preguntar:

translation.en: "Where were you when they took over the planet?"
We're gonna say,
"We just stood by and watched."
[Dylan] You should really look at this as a partnership.
You have to stand on the side of progress if you wanna be a part of history.
translation.es: Ponte del lado del progresopara ser parte de la historia.

four, three, two,
translation.es: Siete, seis, cinco, cuatro, tres, dos, uno, cero.

translation.en: one, zero.
Go ahead and throttle up.
You wanted an answer. You got one.
translation.es: - Conseguí la respuesta que buscabas.- Siempre obtengo lo que quiero.

translation.en: I always get what I want, Sam. We just needed to be sure.
translation.es: - Conseguí la respuesta que buscabas.- Siempre obtengo lo que quiero. Necesitábamos estar seguros.

translation.en: -Sure of what? -That they would go without a fight.
translation.es: - ¿Seguros de qué?- De que se irían sin pelear.

translation.en: -[man] Say again. -[woman] We're tracking an incoming object.
We all work for the Decepticons now.
I need your help to track a phone call. There's a man on this phone.
He's the head of their human operations, and he has Carly hostage.

translation.en: I want you to sit down. Don't move.
Follow me.
I'm watching him drive up right now.
[Dutch] The call was placed en route.
I'm hacking into the phone's camera now.

translation.en: There, that's it. That's a live stream from the camera.

translation.en: Someplace... Hold on. I can triangulate this.
Okay, it's Chicago cell sites. There, I've got it.
Trump Tower, Chicago. Lower penthouse.
We're on.
-I'm going. -[Simmons] You sure?
She's done nothing but try to help me, and I can be there in 15 hours.
translation.es: Ella trató de ayudarme.Llegaré en 15 horas.

I still got my NEST friends out there.

translation.en: I'll round them up, we'll find your girlfriend, we're gonna bring this guy in.

translation.en: Why are you helping me?
'Cause that asshole killed my friends, too.
translation.es: Porque el desgraciadotambién mató a mis amigos.

translation.en: Yes, but really one resource in particular.

translation.en: One unique to our planet.
Us?
You're very smart. You see, they can't rebuild without a slave labor force.

translation.en: How many rocks up there in the universe offer six billion workers?

translation.en: What are you talking about? We can't transport people.
They're not shipping people. They're shipping their planet here.
translation.es: Es al revés.Ellos transportarán su planeta acá.

translation.en: [Carly] Oh, my God.
What's Sentinel doing here? [Dylan] Watch.

translation.en: Your Excellency. He's such a dick.
You want this to happen? I want to survive. I want 40 more years.

translation.en: You think I asked for this? I inherited a client.

translation.en: Yeah, and when Cybertron's here and we're all their slaves,
I guess they'll still need a human leader.

translation.en: Don't jinx me. You want to survive, you listen to me.

Get the dogs out of here now! Get them in the back!
I guess they didn't tell you about this part, did they? -You think I'm at every meeting? -[breathing heavily]

They said I was safe.
Let's roll!

It's not working.
[newscaster, on radio] This is a national emergency broadcast.

Get out of here! Go back!
There is a ring of alien ships around Chicago.
Our high-range bombers were just knocked out of the sky.

Can't we get any eyes in there at all?
They keep shooting down our drones.
They want us blind.

translation.en: My God.
We came here to find her in the middle of all that?

No one's going in.
I am.
With or without you, I'll find her.
You're gonna get yourself killed, Sam. Is that what you want?

translation.en: Is that what you want?
You came all the way out here to get yourself killed? Huh?

translation.en: Listen to what I'm saying. She's here because of me. Do you understand?

translation.en: Listen, if you go in this building,
that's if she's even still alive, there's no way you're gonna be able to reach her!
translation.es: y ella esté viva,no vas a poder llegar a ella!

translation.en: What do you suggest I do?
It's over.
I'm sorry, but it's over.
Whoa! Incoming!
We will kill them all.

translation.en: [Leadfoot] Wreckers, kill him!
[Roadbuster] This is going to hurt!
A lot!
Your leaders will now understand.

translation.en: And we needed them to believe we had gone.

translation.en: For today, in the name of freedom,
translation.es: ¡Porque hoy, en nombre de la libertad,

translation.en: we take the battle to them!
I saw your ship blow up!
We were never in the ship! We designed the damn thing, didn't we?
translation.es: ¡Nunca estuvimos en la nave! Nosotros la diseñamos, ¿no?

translation.en: We were hidden in the first booster rocket to separate.

translation.en: Splashed down back in the Atlantic, just as planned.

translation.en: We ain't going nowhere.
translation.es: No vamos a ir a ningún lado.

translation.en: Yeah, no one's exiling us.
translation.es: Sí, nadie nos va a exiliar.

translation.en: The Autobots are staying right here.
We're gonna help you win this war.
translation.es: Les ayudaremos a ganar la guerra.

translation.en: They're surrounding the city to make a fortress,
translation.es: Sitiaron la ciudadpara hacer una fortaleza

translation.en: so that no one can see what they're up to inside.
translation.es: para que nadie vealo que hacen adentro.

[man] Mini-drone is on approach to Trump Tower.

translation.en: You're telling me Sam's headed into that?
Poor kid.
Probably never got close.
So, you can fly this thing, right?
What is that... What is that? What is that? So-so?
So you so-so can fly this. That feels terrible.

translation.en: We're right behind you.
All right, we're going in!
The city is secure.
The humans cannot stop us.
translation.es: Los humanos no nos pueden parar.

translation.en: [Sentinel] As the afternoon falls,
the rest of the pillars will reach their launch position.
translation.es: los demás pilares llegarána su posición de lanzamiento.

translation.es: ¡Esta es la victoria quete prometí hace muchos años

translation.es: en la que reconstruiríamosCybertron juntos! Accedí a colaborar contigo

translation.en: I have deigned to work with you...
that our planet may survive!
I will never work for you!
You would be wise to remember the difference.

translation.en: [Dylan] Ugh! I'm so sick of this. I'm just sick of waiting.
Where is she?
Where is she?
You've got some balls.
No, Sam!
Carly!
Carly!
Jump!
Bee, fire!
Bee!
Autobots! They're alive! They're here!
Decepticons, defend the pillar!
[Megatron] Raise the bridges! Find them!
You found me. I'd follow you anywhere.

Well, you're crazy.
What is that? Is that us?
[Epps] This thing's a military UAV.
Stone, check and see if it's still working.
[Stone] Yeah, it's still got power. Flight Control, do you copy?

I think we got something.
-[Lennox] Epps! We got Epps! -...rotate, something.
[Epps] Come on, work! Work!
All right, turn the volume up on that!
The kid!
translation.es: - ¡Súbanle al volumen!- ¡El chico! ¿Pueden rotar la cámara?

translation.en: Can you rotate or something?
Yes, yes! Okay, okay, okay. They can see us.
Chicago is ground zero, do you understand?
translation.es: Chicago es el punto de inicio.

translation.en: -Can you hear us? You understand? -Witwicky.
Please listen. Sentinel Prime is here, and he has the pillars to his space bridge.
translation.es: Sentinel tiene los pilarespara su puente espacial.

translation.en: They're on top of a building on Chicago River. It's owned by Hotchkiss Gould Investments.

translation.en: Now, the pillar that controls everything is in the southeast cupola.

or they're going to transport Cybertron here, do you understand?
-Do you understand? -What?
Give me a GPS on the building and on that drone! Let's go!
Mensurate those coordinates. Shorten the kill chain.
[Lennox] Guys on the tarmac, five minutes. The southeast cupola.

translation.en: All right!
We need to move before the fighters spot us.

translation.en: Wait here until we scout a route ahead.

translation.en: -Let's roll. -Ratchet, cover high.
Hey, think we could use that rocket to shoot down the pillar?
We're eight blocks away. We got to get closer to take a shot.

translation.en: Not closer. Higher. We need a clear line of sight.
translation.es: - Necesitamos acercarnos.- Más cerca, no. Más arriba. - Verlo directamente.- Está cruzando el río.

translation.en: And it's across the river. Gonna have a hell of a time trying to sneak up.
translation.es: - Verlo directamente.- Está cruzando el río. Va a ser difícil que no nos vean.

translation.en: We only got one shot.
One shot's all we need.
[Simmons] We got to be able to see around that building from the ground.

translation.en: Get NSA to send service specs for any cameras in that area.

translation.en: Maybe some are working. Traffic lights. ATMs. Anything.
translation.es: Quizá algunas sirvan. De semáforos,cajeros automáticos. Lo que sea.

translation.en: [Lennox] Listen up. You want to hit back?
We're gonna have to wingsuit in.
It's the only way to get close.
I can't promise anyone a ride home, but if you're with me,
translation.es: No les prometo un viaje de regreso,pero si acceden,

translation.en: the world needs you now.
I'll find my own ride home, sir.
Who else?
General Morshower,
requesting diversionary action to the south of the city.
translation.es: General Morshower, solicito distracción al sur de la ciudad.

translation.en: We're coming north and low. You guys drive them to the east.

translation.en: Autobot victory! Autobot victory!
[Epps] That is one scary-ass Decepticon!
They got my trailer. I need that flight tech.

translation.es: Shockwave no nos puede cazara todos a la vez. Wreckers,

Let's get some!
You got that right.
Listen, we're gonna circle around to that glass building.

translation.en: -Let's move! -Wait a minute!

translation.es: ¡Esperen! ¡No se iránsin mis prototipos de combate urbano!

translation.en: We got to go, Que! Come on.
They're great inventions for kicking ass!
[soldier] What are these?
Those are boom-sticks. Armed in 30 seconds.
translation.es: - ¿Qué son?- Son "palos bum". Se activan en 30 segundos.

translation.en: Grapple gloves, for climbing.
[soldier] Go, go! Move your ass! Move, move!
[Optimus] Move, move! Go, go, go!
-Move, move! -[Epps] Let's go!
Let's go! Run!
-Hey, hey, hey. Where you going? -No, no, no!
-Where you going? -Stop, stop, stop! Don't leave!
You never leave a bot behind! Shockwave's coming!
translation.es: ¡Nunca se abandona a un robot! ¡Ahí viene Shockwave!

translation.en: [Epps] Go for the stairs!
[Sam] Epps, this way!
[pilot 1, on radio] Breaking right.
[pilot 2] Bead. Rolling in.
We got another one coming around. Coming around on the left side, coming around on the right side.
translation.es: Viene uno por la izquierday otro por la derecha.

translation.en: We're going to use Willis Tower for cover!
Once we make altitude, we jump!
-A lot of airplanes out here! -Contact off the nose.
[pilot 1] Mayday! I don't think he's gonna make it.
[pilot 2] Mayday, mayday! Six-one going down.
translation.es: - ¡Socorro! ¡No va a poder!- ¡Socorro! ¡6-1 va para abajo!

translation.en: Heads up! Heads up!
Come on, come on, come on, come on.
[pilot 1] Tally on the left. [pilot 2] Got him.
translation.es: - Blanco a la izquierda.- Lo veo.

translation.en: Time on target: 20 seconds.
[Lennox] Here we go! Here we go!
Keep it tight!
[pilot] Coming around. [Baby Face] All right, focus, focus, focus.
[pilot] Threat above tower, six o'clock!
[Starscream] Locusts!
[pilot] Look out! Breaking right, breaking right!
[pilot 1] Watch out, watch out!
[pilot 2] Holy shit!
Look out, look out, look out!
Get them out, get them out, get them out! [Lennox] Everybody out, out, out!
[soldier] Jump, jump, jump!
Get out, get out!
I'm stuck!
[pilot] Now. Get them out now! Get them out now!
Help!
[soldier] Get separation. Track away, track away!
[Lennox] Hard left! Hard left!
Six hundred feet.
Check your six! Check your six!
-[Lennox] He's on our ass! -Watch out, watch out!
[Lennox] Sharp right!
Building dead ahead! Thread the needle!
[soldier] Pull, pull!
[Sam] Come on, we're high enough!
[Eddie] This is a mother getting up here!
-[Epps] Get your fat ass over here! -I'm coming.
translation.es: - ¡Es duro subir aquí!- ¡Ven acá, gordo! ¡Ya voy!

translation.en: Set up the rocket! They're coming.
[Lennox] Weapons status? 29 Bot-busters, 20 piercing D-Bot.
translation.es: - ¡Reporte de armas!- 29 truena bots, 20 perfora D-bots.

translation.en: There, the building with the dome.
For our brothers, let's make this trip worth it.
translation.es: Por nuestros hermanos, hagamos que valga la pena.

translation.en: Oh, God.
Whoa, whoa.
-[soldier 1] The building! -[soldier 2] Oh, shit!
They're shooting at the building!
This is not a good idea.
-What? -This is not a good idea.
-This building is unstable. -Listen, stop for a second.
translation.es: El edificio es inestable. Si no hacemos esto,nos morimos todos.

translation.en: If we don't do what we came to do, it doesn't matter, we all die.
translation.es: Si no hacemos esto,nos morimos todos.

translation.en: Right? That's your target. Come on, man!
I don't even care if the building collapses. I'm having a heart attack anyway.
translation.es: Ni me importa que se colapse.Me está dando un infarto.

translation.en: The building is going over!
-Hang on! -Take cover!
[Epps] Keep your hands up!
It's okay! It stopped!
Guys, look!
-[soldier] Incoming, incoming! -[Epps] Everybody hide!
[whispers] Don't move.
[Epps] Go, go.
Run!
Cover fire!
[Epps] Shoot the glass! Jump out the window!
[Sam] Jump!
[soldier] We're gonna die!
[Carly] Sam, I can't stop!
Shoot the glass!
Sam! Sam!
Is everybody okay?
[Sam] You okay?
What the hell was that?
-This evil thing's looking at me! -What?
It's even got an uglier Decepticon with it!
translation.es: ¡Y trae un Decépticon más feo todavía!

translation.en: We have to evac!
Sergeant Epps, the stairs are blocked!
[soldier] We're trapped!
Okay. How do we get out of here? Hey! Come on!
Oh, Lord Jesus, let me just get out of this alive.
translation.es: Dios, déjame salir con vida. Déjame salir.

translation.en: Move! We got to move!
Why do the Decepticons always get the good shit?
Move! We're about to be eaten, people!
Hold on!
Give me your hand!
-I'm swinging that way! -[Hooch] Got her!
[Carly] Oh, my God! [Sam] I'm dropping you on the fire escape!
Sam!
Whoa! We gotta move!
Move, move!
I'm coming for you!
[Roadbuster] Optimus!
Wreckers!
We're coming!
Decepticons around the world,
launch the pillars.
[Wheelie] We are so lost!
[Brains] Always left out.
It's time to lay down the law.
About to bring some hurt now.
[Sam] It's starting! You see it?
Look out!
Where are Sam and Carly?
We'll go this way.
I give you one thing to do, one thing to do, and you drop the ball on that?
translation.es: ¡Te asigno una sola tareay no puedes con ella!

translation.en: I ain't signed up for all this!
Got aliens blasting at me, running around, chasing me!
I'm ducking through churches, and buildings, and all that kind of crap!
This is bullshit! I ain't signed up for this, Epps.
I'm trying to keep it together.
-What a treat! You and me, alone! -Carly!
Come on, come on! Run!
Okay. He's after me, not you.
translation.es: ¡Me quiere a mí, no a ti!

translation.en: Run!
You can't hide, boy!
I just love it when your little insect feet try to run!
translation.es: ¡Corre! ¡Me encanta ver tus patitas de insecto tratando de correr!

translation.en: -Sam! -Run!
I thought you were working for us, boy?
No! Sam!
My eye!
My eye!
Target the Decepticon!
Please, you've got to save Sam!
-You've got to save him! -What the hell is he doing?
This better work.
D-Bots! D-Bots!
I can't see! I can't see!
Sam!
It's on my hand! Grab the knife! Knife!
translation.es: ¡Está en mi mano! - ¡Toma el cuchillo!- ¡Sí, sí!

translation.en: -I'm trying! -Knife, knife, knife, knife, knife!
The bomb's gonna blow! The bomb's gonna...
You human scum!
-We got 20 seconds on that bomb! -What bomb?
You see that bomb? Cut it, cut it, cut it!
[Lennox] I got it!
How long do we have?
[Starscream] I'm gonna kick you!
I'm gonna kill--
Well, he's dead.
Hey, Bee's going to run with the rest of the Autobots
translation.es: Bee se va a ir con los Autobotsy nos verán en el río.

translation.en: -and meet us at the edge of the river. -All right.
translation.es: Bee se va a ir con los Autobotsy nos verán en el río. ¡Muy bien!

translation.en: [Wheelie] It sucked me in. There was nothing I could do.
This is a total cluster...
We got to get across the river.
You see that? She said the control pillar -was in that first cupola. -All right.
translation.es: ¿Ves eso? El pilar de controlestá en la primera cúpula.

translation.en: Let's go! Move! Let's move!
[man, on radio] Tomahawks are inbound.
ETA: 20 minutes. I'm in the traffic cameras.
translation.es: - Tiempo estimado: 20 minutos.- Entré en las cámaras.

translation.en: [man] Four Autobots are captured.
[Mearing] Oh, my God. We're helpless.
Whatever's set to happen, with those pulses getting faster, it's gonna happen soon.
translation.es: Lo que vaya a pasar, con las pulsacionesaumentando, pasará pronto.

translation.en: [man] No sign of Optimus.
[Lennox] How do we get these bridges down?
Spread out. Check in there.
Epps!
Epps, I've been looking for your ass. How you doing?
Retirement is wack. Even worse,
translation.es: - ¿Cómo estás?- Me aburrió el retiro. Peor aún, no podemos llegar a ese edificio

translation.en: we can't get across the river to that building,
translation.es: Peor aún, no podemos llegar a ese edificio

translation.en: and the Autobots are upstairs, surrounded.
translation.es: y los Autobots están arriba, rodeados.

translation.en: Just pan the camera around, all right? All right. Pan... Pan right. That's you.
translation.es: - Haz girar la cámara.- Gira a la derecha. Te hablo a ti.

translation.en: Try getting into the bridge control room.
translation.es: Trata de llegar al cuarto de control.

translation.en: [Mearing] What are they doing? They're just standing there.
Hang on. Dutch, see if you can hack into the bridge.
translation.es: - Están ahí parados.- Dutch, entra en los controles del puente.

translation.en: [soldier] Sir, SEALs are here.
It's a good day, boys! What do you got?
Got a ten-man SEAL unit, sir, tasked with vectoring Tomahawks.
translation.es: Diez hombres que dirigirána los Tomahawks.

translation.en: -How long? -Fifteen.
[Soundwave] You're my prisoners!
translation.es: - ¿En cuánto tiempo?- En 15. - ¡Son mis prisioneros!- Tranquilo. Nos rendimos.

translation.en: Take it easy. We surrender.
[Autobot] Get off me.
[Lennox] All right, you're gonna need your 40 Mike-Mikes and your frags. Go full auto.
translation.es: Necesitan lanzadores y granadas.Las vibraciones bloquean los circuitos.

translation.en: The vibrations jack up their circuits. Snipers, shoot for the eyes.
translation.es: Necesitan lanzadores y granadas.Las vibraciones bloquean los circuitos. ¡Apunten a los ojos!

translation.en: All right, your target is up on top of that building, that cupola.
translation.es: Su blanco está arribade ese edificio. La cúpula.

translation.en: How doomed you are, Autobots.
You simply fail to understand
that the needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few.
translation.es: que las necesidades de muchossuperan las de la minoría.

translation.en: Activating the bridge.
They happy about something.
We're in the heart of their ship.
translation.es: Estamos en el corazónde su nave.

translation.en: Let's give 'em a little ride.
[laughs] We gonna screw this ship up.
[Dutch] It's a 128K binary encryption code.
It's difficult.
But not for me. I'm in. Bridge down.
translation.es: Pero no para mí, ya entré. Bajar puente.

translation.en: The bridge is coming down! Someone's watching over us!
Come on! Let's go!
"Pleasure working with you, Seymour,"
I believe you're supposed to say.
Good job, Dutch.
[Ratchet] Get off me!
[Roadbuster] Hurry! They're triggering the pillars!
Prisoners? You're keeping prisoners?
Yes. You need to teach them about respect.
This was all business, but now it's personal, do you understand me?
translation.es: Esto era un negocio,pero ahora es personal.

translation.en: I understand. No prisoners, only trophies.
translation.es: Entiendo. Nada de prisioneros, solo trofeos.

translation.en: Bee, I think they're going to kill us.
translation.es: Bee, creo que nos van a matar.

translation.en: -You, your time is up. -Wait, wait, wait!
We surrendered! We're your prisoners.
-Move it! -Can't we talk this out?
We're all a bunch of good chaps! I mean you no... Ugh!
Why did you--
Goodbye, my old friend.
You're mine now.
Get off me!
-I got to help him. -What?
What are you doing?
-I got to help him. -Sam, you can't help him.
Sam!
Turn around.
We... We gave 'em a hell of a run.
We did it, Brains! We did it!
Rip this ship apart.
-We had a nice run, Brains, you and me. -Yeah, we gonna die.
translation.es: - La pasamos bien, tú y yo.- Sí, vamos a morir.

translation.en: Come on.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Okay, baby! You all come with us!
[Lennox] Go! You guys, follow that ground team! Go!
[soldier] Move, move, move!
[Lennox] Epps, third floor! We're going to 45!
All right. Two snipers, right here!
All right, dock up!
We jump in three minutes!
Set up shop right here.
Set up.
I'm downstairs.
We got five targets and Shockwave right below us.
translation.es: Tenemos cinco blancosy a Shockwave abajo.

translation.en: Stand by to jump!
All right, let's go! Get ready, get ready.
Go!
Snipers, take out their eyes.
-[groans] -All right, demo team, let's crank steel.
Turning steel!
Don't fire till I tell you!
[Lennox] Go!
Good job, kid!
Fire!
-We got him! -Yeah!
He's on the run!
Autobots, attack!
Mortar that bridge!
It's our world now!
Commence transport!
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Optimus!
You die! Hyah!
No!
[Optimus] Get down here, Sentinel!
Optimus...
you forget your place!
I bring you Cybertron, your home...
and still you choose humanity.
translation.es: Y aun así eliges a la humanidad.

translation.en: You were the one who taught me freedom is everyone's right.
translation.es: Tú me enseñaste que la libertades el derecho de todos.

translation.en: I will retrigger that pillar!
Then you'll have to go through me!
Okay, I've got to try and help.
-I have to. You stay here. -Don't you go. Don't go.
You're gonna be fine, okay? I promise. I got to get to that pillar.
translation.es: Estarás bien, ¿sí? Te lo juro. Voy por ese pilar.

translation.en: Charge the pillar!
We got Autobots!
[Sentinel] Reinforcements!
Decepticon ships, fire at Optimus!
We're taking fire! I need those Tomahawks now!
[man, over radio] First wave inbound.
We've got to cover for Optimus!
Decepticons, trigger the pillar!
Restart that pillar!
Trigger the pillars.
I can't hold them! The ships have us pinned!
translation.es: ¡No los puedo detener! ¡Las naves nos inmovilizaron!

translation.en: No!
[soldier] Inbound, ten seconds! Danger close!
Mark-Lima-Echo-Echo, 14250!
Positive surface contact.
-[man] Target I.D. -Target acquired.
translation.es: - Contacto positivo.- Blanco identificado. Blanco ubicado.

translation.en: Dylan! Wait!
No!
Shit!
Stop! Stop!
No!
You can't do this, okay?
There's only one future for me.
translation.es: Solo hay un futuro para mí.

translation.en: Cybertron, you are saved, at last.
translation.es: Cybertron, estás a salvo por fin.

translation.en: Oh. Have you come to surrender?
-Was it all worth it? -Obviously.
All your work to bring Sentinel back, and now clearly he has all the power.
translation.es: Tanto trabajo para revivir a Sentinely ahora él tiene todo el poder.

translation.en: It's actually almost tragic.
You dare lecture me, slave?
Your Decepticons finally conquering this planet,
and yet, their leader won't be you! It will be me! It will always be me.
translation.es: - pero tú no serás su líder!- ¡Sí seré yo! ¡Siempre seré yo!

translation.en: In any minute now,
you'll be nothing but Sentinel's bitch.
translation.es: no serás nada más que la mascota de Sentinel.

translation.en: [Hooch] Rocket!
You chose sides?
You chose wrong.
[Sentinel] Always the bravest of us!
But you could never make the hard decisions!
Our planet will survive.
No!
We were gods once. All of us.
-But here... -Please!
...there will only be one!
[Megatron] This is my planet!
I just saved a whole other world.
You think you're a hero, huh? You think you're a hero?
translation.es: ¿Tú crees que eres un héroe?¿Te crees un héroe?

translation.en: No. I'm just a messenger.
The pillar's still connected!
[Epps] Bring it up!
-Bee! Let's do this! -[Lennox] Let's go, let's go! Move, move!
translation.es: ¡Bee! ¡Hay que hacer esto!¡El pilar sigue conectado!

translation.en: Pillar's still connected!
translation.es: ¡Hay que hacer esto!¡El pilar sigue conectado!

translation.en: [Roadbuster] Rip that pillar down!
Now, we need a truce.
All I want is to be back in charge.
translation.es: Yo solo quiero recuperar el mando.

translation.en: Besides,
who would you be without me, Prime?
Time to find out.
Optimus, all I ever wanted
translation.es: Óptimus, lo único que he queridoes que nuestra raza sobreviviera.

translation.en: was the survival of our race.
translation.es: lo único que he queridoes que nuestra raza sobreviviera.

translation.en: You must see why I had to betray you.
translation.es: Debes entender por quétuve que traicionarte.

translation.en: You didn't betray me.
translation.es: Tú no me traicionaste a mí.

translation.en: You betrayed yourself.
No, Optimus!
I love you.
I love you.
You're the only thing I need in this world, and I'll do anything to make it up to you, I promise.
translation.es: Eres lo único que necesito.Haré lo que sea para compensarte por todo.

translation.en: I'm going to hold you to that.
Just never let me go.
I promise.
[Carly] Ooh. Rings.
I love this car.
-Bee, you've got to slow it down. -[laughing]
You got to slow way down, okay?
I'm just trying to help out.
[Optimus] In any war,
there are calms between storms.
translation.es: hay tiempos de calma entre las tormentas.

translation.en: You fought bravely.
There will be days when we lose faith.
translation.es: Habrá días en que perderemos la fe.

translation.en: Days when our allies turn against us.
translation.es: Días en que nuestros aliadosnos traicionarán.

translation.en: But the day will never come that we forsake this planet
translation.es: Pero jamás llegará el día en que abandonaremos suerte este planeta

translation.en: and its people.
That's what I call the start of a beautiful future.
translation.es: Esto es lo que llamo el iniciode un hermoso futuro.

translation.en: -Arrest him. -[laughs]
-It was worth it! -Get him out of here!
I'd go to jail for love! I don't care!
Go ahead, take me in! I want to go in! Let's go in.
Come on, Charlotte, take me in right now!
